FMiPText:
Hello

Your device needs repairing and we promise you the best possible service.
But before we can repair your device we need you to click and deactivate two services.

Is your ¡®¡®Find My iPhone/iPad¡¯¡® active on your device?
=> yes <=

If so, please turn it off.

For help and more info check out:
http://support.apple.com/kb/PH2702?viewlocale=en_US&locale=en_US

And is the ¡®¡®Lost¡¯¡® mode active on your device?
=> yes <=

Again please turn it off.

For help and more info click on:
http://support.apple.com/kb/PH2700?viewlocale=en_US&locale=en_US

When both services are turned off, simply click on OK and send off your device to be repaired.

We are here if you need any more help or advice, simply contact us by e-mail at logistics@salt.ch.

Thanks for your co-operation and your loyalty.
Salt.
